name: CIFAR-10 FAN Subset
description: Subset of CIFAR-10 dataset adapted for Fuzzy Attention Networks

class_descriptions.airplane: A flying aircraft with wings and engines
class_descriptions.automobile: A four-wheeled motor vehicle for transportation
class_descriptions.bird: A warm-blooded vertebrate with feathers and wings
class_descriptions.deer: A hoofed grazing animal with antlers

class_descriptions.frog: A tailless amphibian that lives in water and on land
